Uses of Class
fr.sii.ogham.email.builder.AttachmentResourceTranslatorBuilder

  • Packages that use AttachmentResourceTranslatorBuilder 
    Package Description
    fr.sii.ogham.email.builder  

    • Uses of AttachmentResourceTranslatorBuilder in fr.sii.ogham.email.builder

      Methods in fr.sii.ogham.email.builder that return AttachmentResourceTranslatorBuilder 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AttachmentResourceTranslatorBuilder EmailBuilder.getResourceTranslatorBuilder()
      Get the builder used to transform the resources associated to the message.
      AttachmentResourceTranslatorBuilder AttachmentResourceTranslatorBuilder.useDefaultLookups()
      Tells the builder to use the default lookup mapping: "classpath" for searching attachment into the classpath "file" for searching attachment on the file system "" when no lookup is defined.
      AttachmentResourceTranslatorBuilder AttachmentResourceTranslatorBuilder.useDefaults()
      Tells the builder to use all default behaviors and values.
      AttachmentResourceTranslatorBuilder AttachmentResourceTranslatorBuilder.withLookupResolver(String lookup, ResourceResolver resource)
      Register a lookup mapping.
      AttachmentResourceTranslatorBuilder AttachmentResourceTranslatorBuilder.withTranslator(AttachmentResourceTranslator translator)
      Register a new translator.
      Methods in fr.sii.ogham.email.builder with parameters of type AttachmentResourceTranslatorBuilder 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      EmailBuilder EmailBuilder.withAttachmentFeatures(AttachmentResourceTranslatorBuilder builder)
      Enable attachment features using the provided translator builder.
